titleInfo.title: Map of the Straights of Niagara from Lake Erie to Lake Ontario

subject.topic: United States. Navy--History--Revolution, 1775-1783, War of 1812, etc.

mods.abstract: Atlas etching shows key military sites along the Niagara River. From James Wilkinson, "Diagrams and Plans, Illustrative of the Principle Battles and Military Affairs, Treated of in Memoirs of My Own Times."
